Articles.Content:
I was wondering if I could get some help finding new gamepad here? The current one I am using is an ancient Saitek P2500 and while it's still going strong, the d-pad and buttons stick sometimes; I need something better for Dead Cells.

The layout is basically Playstation, dual sticks with the d-pad on top, six buttons, two triggers. It's a bit unconventional so I would be willing to use a quad trigger, four button layout, but the Playstation-style sticks and d-pad layout, along with the basic controller shape, are crucial, I can't stand the X-Box style, having grown up with an NES and the d-pad dominant layout.

 I could, of course, just browse Newegg but they have way too many selections and I didn't see any way to filter out X-Box style gamepads. I don't mind paying for quality (that's why I'm asking) but I'm also not some pr0-gamer here willing to pony up for Razer products that don't appear to offer any competitive advantage to me over a solid Microsoft Wheel Mouse Optical (I actually ordered an old one back-stock from China because they fit my hand just right), especially considering I play single-player games.

TIA
you can use a ps4 controller thats what i use
i havent been shopping for controllers since i bought my ch hotas 10 years ago. things just dont die.
